meanings.definition: To remove or reduce feminine qualities or characteristics.
meanings.sent1: She wanted to defeminize her wardrobe by getting rid of all the pink dresses.
meanings.sent2: The stylist suggested defeminizing the outfit by adding a leather jacket.
meanings.sent3: In order to defeminize the room, they decided to paint the walls a neutral color.
meanings.sent4: The artist defeminized the portrait by giving the subject a more angular jawline.
meanings.sent5: The goal was to defeminize the character in the movie to make her more relatable to all audiences.

meanings.definition: To make less feminine in nature or appearance.
meanings.sent1: The company tried to defeminize their marketing campaign to appeal to a wider audience.
meanings.sent2: The new haircut defeminized her look and gave her a more edgy style.
meanings.sent3: He jokingly said he needed to defeminize his workspace by adding more sports memorabilia.
meanings.sent4: The designer defeminized the dress by removing the floral patterns and adding bold stripes.
meanings.sent5: The goal of the makeover was to defeminize her appearance and give her a more androgynous look.
